phrases: What should I do?
Oh, you do not have to do anything.
You can go home.
We are done for today.
It looks like our Haruhi-esque activities are done for the day.
She was able to get her hands on all of this stuff,
and with the kind of skill that could even get an experienced negotiator to lean left.
On top of that, it all cost nothing.
In other words, it was free.
There is nothing scarier than something that is free.
The problem is that Haruhi is not scared at all.
Actually, if there is something that would scare Haruhi, please, let me know.
DAY BY DAY unzari dayone dakara Day by day, everything's just so dull
Doudou to kotowacchau kimi ni narina yo That is why you need to become someone that can just reject it all
OH MY BOY kippari shinakya uso ni Oh my boy, you need to be decisive
Tsukiatterarenai yo semai sekai de I will not deal with any lies in this small world
Jibun de mitsuketa MYSELF suki ni natte touzen I found myself on my own, it is natural you would fall for me
Kudaranai yarikara kette Kick away the boring ways of doing things,
subete wa atashi ga kimeru I am going to decide everything
I SAY I SAY MY HEAVEN I say, I say my heaven
SUPER DRIVER tosshin makasete nantettate zenshin Super driver, leave everything to the rush
SUPER DRIVER tosshin makasete nantettate zenshin
And just keep going forward, no matter what
Fukanou (DO NOT YOU STOP ME) Tobikoete TAKE IT EASY, GO!
Surpass (Do not you stop me)
The idea of impossible
Fukanou (DO NOT YOU STOP ME) Tobikoete TAKE IT EASY, GO!
Take it easy, go!
Daishouri tte doukan I agree, it is going to be a huge victory
Mochiron dounatta tte kaikan
Of course, it will feel pleasant, no matter what happens
Hanseikai?
(GET BACK TO WILD) Sore yori saa isoide yo A review meeting?
(Get back to wild)
Forget that, now hurry up
Aremo koremo mitaiken itsudatte muriyari
We have not tried this or that, we always do things how we want
Marude marude mikeiken korekara shimashou Everything's a new experience, let us try them out
Aremo koremo mitaiken itsudatte totsuzen
We have not tried this or that, we always do things suddenly
Marude marude mikeiken sore ga doushita no?
Everything's a new experience, what about it?
What is all that?
Presents for good little kids?
What, this?
Of course not.
Oh, model guns.
I did not know you were into those.
I am not.
These are Haruhi's.
Huh, Suzumiya's...
Well, it must be tough.
By the way.
What?
Well, the school festival is coming soon, right?
What are you guys going to do this time?
Why ask me?
I do not think I would get a serious response if I asked Suzumiya.
Nagato would not say anything if I asked her,
and Miss Asahina will not come near me.
And the other guy... is kind of creepy.
That is why I am asking you.
What, am I the P.R. Rep now, or am I just a nice guy?
It is the latter, definitely.
I mean, you seem like the kind of guy that will stick with someone,
even if you know that the path you are taking is leading to a cliff.
I am hurt.
Fine, I will not tell you when I find out, then.
Hey!
Even I know that what awaits us at the end of Haruhi's little path
is going to be pointless.
But it is not just Haruhi and me walking down that path.
There are at least three others coming along with us.
I am sure two of them would be fine if left to their own devices,
but Miss Asahina would be in danger.
For someone from the future, she sure does not seem to be able
to predict any of the problems that might happen to her.
It is obvious to me that I have to protect her.
The Sigh of Haruhi Suzumiya II
It is obvious to me that I have to protect her.
The Sigh of Haruhi Suzumiya II
Hurry up and get undressed!
I will help.
O-Oh no, please, do not pull-
Come on!
Come in.
Well?
It really suits her, oddly enough.
I thought that it was of Caean make or something.
Hello!
Oh, excuse me.
Oh my.
That looks quite good on you.
You can tell that just by looking at her.
What I cannot tell is why there is a waitress in here,
since this is not a cafe or anything.
Well, you see...
Mikuru is going to wear this costume in the movie!
Is her usual maid outfit not good enough?
Of course not.
A maid is a person that gives private service to someone in a mansion somewhere.
But waitresses are different.
They work at restaurants where they provide their services to the public.
That is no reason to put Miss Asahina in this outfit.
Never mind the details!
This is just a question of atmosphere.
And it is fine with me!
Even if it is fine with you, is it fine with Miss Asahina?
Umm...
T-This feels like it is a bit small for me...
S-So, you see...
It is all right!
This is just right.
It is like a perfect fit.
It is no use.
She is made her decision.
In other words, this is our movie's concept!
I decided to dedicate myself to entertainment
as the representative director for the SO IS Brigade!
Just watch!
We will get a standing ovation, we will leave no one in their seats!
Director Just watch!
We will get a standing ovation, we will leave no one in their seats!
Yuki!
You understand, do not you!
That is it!
I do not know if that is it.
It looks like her costume for her class's fortune telling.
Based on the answers Nagato gave to Haruhi's rapid-fire questions,
that seems to be the case.
In any case, what was she up to, walking here like that?
That costume is perfect for the role I have in mind.
What do you mean, perfect?
This!
Is... is this my fault?
Mikuru - Fighting waitress from the future Koizumi - Teenage esper Yuki - Evil alien Is... is this my fault?
Mikuru - Fighting waitress from the future Koizumi - Teenage esper Yuki - Evil alien
How can I put this?
It is really the kind of casting I would expect from you, Miss Suzumiya.
It is wonderful.
Do not smile at me.
I will turn to stone.
I am sorry...
Okay, Kyon!
Get those guns ready to be used by the end of the day.
We are going to start shooting tomorrow, after all.
Oh, you have to learn how to handle a camera, got it?
Do you think we are going to have any particular problems?
Have we ever NOT had any problems with anything she is done?
Do not make me laugh.
Well, it is not really a laughing matter, but it is not a reason to despair, either.
How do you know that?
Because those are movie roles.
There is no way that Miss Suzumiya actually believes that I am a teenage esper.
The Itsuki Koizumi that I am set to play in the fiction of the movie
is an esper, that is all.
No one actually mixes up an actor with the character they play in a movie, right?
Even if there are people who do, Miss Suzumiya is not one of them.
That still does not make me feel better.
There is no proof that what you are saying is true.
If she was the kind of person that would mix up the real world with fiction,
then our world would already be a much more fantastic place.
I have said this before, but Miss Suzumiya
actually has a fairly realistic way of thinking.
I know that.
I have been pulled into numerous odd situations
because her realistic way of thinking sort of ambles into her godlike existence.
Brigade leader
Brigade leader
On top of that, Haruhi does not know she is doing it.
We cannot show Miss Suzumiya any proof of this, of course.
There might come a time where we have to, but this is not that time.
Thankfully, Miss Asahina and Miss Nagato are in agreement with us.
I would be okay if things stayed this way forever, though.
So would I.
I do not want to see the world go to pieces.
I think you should be more worried about yourself than the world.
There are replacements for myself and Miss Nagato,
but there is no understudy for you.
For the school festival Practice file 3
Feh, what is the big deal about the school festival?
It pisses me off.
Why?
I am not having any fun at all,
so the people who are having fun are a real eyesore.
Especially couples, they fill me with murderous intent.
Is not that just you resenting them?
And what is with our class?
A survey? !
How stupid.
Then you should have come up with an idea.
If you had, then maybe Haruhi would not have come up with this movie idea.
As if.
There is no way I would let them push me into doing more.
That is true.
If only Miss Asakura were still here.
It really sucked to have a double A-plus class girl leave.
I wonder if they would let me change classes now.
Which class would you want to go to?
Maybe Miss Nagato's class?
Oh yeah, I saw her walking around in some kind of magician outfit yesterday.
What was that all about?
Who knows?
I sure do not.
Hm, when was it that I saw you and Nagato in the classroom in each other's arms?
Well, you see...
I know, it was something Suzumiya cooked up, right?
What?
Y-Yeah...
This was an attempt to freak me out, right?
Nice try, but no dice.
Taniguchi misunderstanding what happened is a load off of my shoulders...
This was an attempt to freak me out, right?
Nice try, but no dice.
This was an attempt to freak me out, right?
Nice try, but no dice.
Thanks, Taniguchi.
Your stupidity will save the world.
Thanks, Taniguchi.
Your stupidity will save the world.
Man, but this is boring.
Okay, everyone!
We are heading to the first location!
This is sudden.
I looked for a good place around the school,
but it looks like we have no choice but to go someone else nearby.
Mikuru, get ready.
A-Am I going, too?
Of course.
We cannot do anything without the lead.
B-But... in this outfit?
Yup, that is right.
C-Could I at least wear a jacket over this?
No!
It is because you think you are embarrassed that you get all nervous.
At this rate, we will never be able to get a Golden Globe!
Were not we trying to get best of the festival for the school festival?
Oh, yeah, Yuki!
Take this!
I have changed your role, so now you are an evil alien witch!
And she is already screwing with the script!
Well, it is true that Nagato's powers seem like magic.
Come on, Kyon, get the camera ready!
Okay, let us get going!
All together!
It looks like she is serious.
What the?
Hey, Haruhi.
You do not intend to make these two get on the train in these outfits, do you?
- Is there a problem with that? - Of course there is!
Why?
They might get arrested if they were buck naked,
but they are wearing clothes, right?
Oh, would the bunny girl outfit have been better?
You should have said so earlier.
I do not think that is something that someone who went to the trouble
of getting a waitress outfit should be saying!
Wait, did not you say that her being a waitress was part of the movie's concept?
What is most important right now is adaptability.
That is how all living things on the Earth have managed to evolve, right?
If you just idly stand by, you are going to get left behind!
If the environment was sentient,
then Haruhi would have been thrown out of the atmosphere by now.
Oh, the train's here!
Come on, Mikuru!
Get going already!
We are here, as promised!
Oh, good work.
Ah, is this the girl from the day before yesterday?
I did not recognize her.
Okay, I am counting on you.
Roger that!
All right, everyone.
We are going to have a quick meeting, so gather around.
We are going to be shooting a commercial!
What?
Ohmori Electronics
T-This shop is...
The manager is a really good person.
And he is a nice guy.
Umm...
They have been around since current owner Eijirou's grandfather.
You can find anything from batteries to refrigerators here.
Umm... well...
In any case, please come by Ohmori Electronics!
Okay, cut!
Hmm, I just do not feel the emotion...
I wonder why that is...
Mama, what is that?
Shh, you must not look.
I have got it!
For the love of God, please do not get anything else!
It does not make sense for a waitress to be at an electronics store.
That is it!?
Koizumi, hand me the small bag over there!
Yes, madam.
Let me have a camera, and I will put a commercial for your store in my movie.
Sure thing.
That is probably the conversation Haruhi had with the owner in five seconds.
Mikuru, come here a second.
Oh my.
It does not look like I will have any lines in this part.
Actually, I am one of the actors in my class's stage production, too.
I am having quite a hard time remembering all of the lines.
Oh really.
I would prefer it if my role for this was light on lines, but...
How about if you take the lead role?
Haruhi's the one controlling the casting.
Ask her if you want to switch.
Do you really think that I could do something as frightening as that?
These are Miss Suzumiya's orders after all,
and I would rather not imagine what would await me if I disobeyed them.
I would rather not, either.
That is why I am sitting here as the cameraman.
And we are back!
It is Miss Asahina's first costume from a while back.
A perfect bunny girl.
Oh yeah, that was over half a year ago.
Now that I think about it, quite a bit happened then.
Right now, they are fond memories...
As if!
Okay, this is perfect!
A bunny girl really is the best fit for introducing a product.
Okay, we are going to take it from the top!
Kyon, get the camera ready!
All right, this is take two!
And so, the commercial for the electronics store was finished.
There is one thing you need to remember, though.
There was one other sponsor that we visited last time.
Yamatsuchi Model Shop
All right.
Okay then, Mikuru.
Do it just like you did at the other store!
There were no problems that time!
Like hell there were not.
Okay, action!
T-This model shop opened for business last year
after Mr. Keiji Yamatsuchi, age 28, left his corporate job.
It is like his hobbies took over his actions, and he just did it.
And as many thought, sales have not met expectations...
The first-half earnings this year are down 80 from last year...
So shop as much as you can, everyone!
You want me to hold it?
D-Do not shoot while pointing at people!
Hold off by shooting things like empty cans!
You want me to shoot?
All right, cut!
Today's filming was only so-so.
But tomorrow we are going to start shooting the movie itself.
We have already added fifteen minutes to the movie with the commercials.
How long is the actual movie going to be?
Well, we will just shoot as much as we can and edit it down later.
These days, it is a snap with a computer.
And who is going to be doing the snapping?
I have got the feeling that editor was one of the things listed under my jobs.
Tomorrow's Saturday, and a day off from school,
so I want everyone to show up!
Be at Kitaguchi Station at nine of the clock!
Hey, Haruhi.
Cannot you do something about Miss Asahina's outfit?
There has to be a more appropriate outfit for someone who fights.
You know, like a plug suit or a stealth suit or something.
Tsk tsk.
If she wore something like that, there would be no unpredictability.
The audience will be surprised and go whoa!
Because it is a waitress that is fighting.
Being able to grab the audience is vital!
That is the concept, you know!
I wonder if she understands the meaning of the word concept.
Well, never mind that, then.
Why is she here from the future?
Well, that is, you know.
Umm, the character does not have to be from the future, right?
It is all right!
We will figure that out when the time comes!
And if we cannot think of something, then we will just ignore it!
As long as it is amusing, it is fine!
That is only if it is amusing though, right?
It is not much good if only the director finds it amusing!
Are you trying to get the Golden Raspberry award for non-pros?
What are you talking about?
There is only one thing we are going for.
That is the best of the festival for the school festival!
And if we can, the Golden Globe, too!
All right, then.
At least show me the script.
How is it coming along?
No problem!
It is all up here.
The script and the storyboards are all ready to go!
You do not have to think about a thing.
Well, that is just great.
You do not need to think about anything, either.
You just need to sit and stare out the window.
As long as you had a pleasant look on your face, you would be as cute as Miss Asahina.
What?
Nothing.
Okay, everyone.
We are going to get fired up!
You need to be idealistic if you want to capture any glory.
When you free yourself of your inhibitions, the latent abilities
within you will awaken, revealing unimaginable powers!
This is not a counterattack like you would see in a battle manga, you know...
- It is a balloon! -
Oh, you are right.
- It is a balloon! -
Oh, you are right.
The next morning.
As of today, we have fallen into a strange situation.
No, how can I put this?
What did Haruhi say?
Something like,
Mommy, how far will the balloon go?
Huh?
Huh?
What did Haruhi say?
Something like,
Mommy, how far will the balloon go?
Huh?
Huh?
Mommy, how far will the balloon go?
Huh?
Huh?
When you free yourself of your inhibitions, the latent abilities
Well, pretty far.
When you free yourself of your inhibitions, the latent abilities
Well, pretty far.
Well, pretty far.
Within you will awaken, revealing unimaginable powers!
Within you will awaken, revealing unimaginable powers!
Huh?
Pretty far?
Huh?
Pretty far?
But Haruhi, the one gaining powers will not be you.
But Haruhi, the one gaining powers will not be you.
And you will not even know it.
You are late!
It is not even nine yet.
You are still last.
As punishment, you are buying us lunch.
Yeah, yeah.
Well, I will cover the bus fare!
It is part of our necessary expenses!
Thanks.
Oh yeah!
I need to put this on...
Why are you wearing your school uniform?
She told me to wear it yesterday.
It is because I am playing a high school student who has psychic powers.
So you are just playing yourself.
All right, this works!
Okay, the bus stop is this way!
Super Director
Okay, the bus stop is this way!
Super Director Come on, Kyon, hurry up!
Come on, Kyon, hurry up!
After thirty minutes of being shaken by the bus
and thirty minutes of walking,
we ended up in a place that would make you ask,
Why did we come to a place no one wants to come to?
Man, it is hot...
Umm...
Would you like some of mine?
If you do not mind that it is half-drunk...
Half-drunk?
Oh, thank you.
Take care of that later!
You too, Mikuru!
There is no time to give our gofer a drink break!
Come on, we are going to start shooting.
Get changed!
But...
It is fine!
If you go far enough in, you will not run into anyone!
The half-drunk...
- Do not peek.
- Right.
Ta-dah!
It is a color contact.
Having different colored eyes is pretty important, you know!
One differently colored eye will increase the sense of mystery!
It is symbolic!
And there is a secret in this blue eye of hers!
Well, it would make no sense for her to just have a differently colored eye.
So?
What is the secret?
It is still a secret!
Come on, Mikuru, how long are you going to loaf about?
Hey!
Mikuru!
Stop being so embarrassed!
You just need to get into your character!
Okay, try running one more time.
It looks like this is our opening sequence, worthy of celebration.
I thought that she would at least write a script or something,
but Haruhi simply declared that there was not one.
We would be in big trouble if I wrote it down and it got leaked.
That is the reason she gave.
I wonder when this turned into a Hong Kong flick.
Okay!
Once more, like you did the third time!
Okay, next up is the fight scene between Mikuru and Yuki!
Mikuru, shoot at Yuki with all you have got!
But did not they say to not point these at people?
It is all right.
There is no way you will hit her, Mikuru!
And if it looks like she would get hit, Yuki will be able to dodge it.
It is all right.
Fire.
See?
She said it is all right!
Shoot her up!
Oh yeah, do not fire them at the same time, but one after the other!
That is one of the basics of two-gun fighting!
Yeah.
I guess this works.
Hey, Haruhi.
How is this a movie?
I have no idea what is going on.
That is fine!
We will just cut and paste it together during editing.
And who is going to do that?
That cutting and pasting?
At least put in some dialog.
It is fine!
If we have to, we will mute the sound and record the dialog afterwards!
We have to put in sound effects and background music, anyways!
You do not have to think too hard about this!
Even if we wanted to, the story is only in your head,
so there is nothing for us to think about.
Sora kara ochite kitanda
It fell from the sky
Subete no negai wo nosete With all of the wishes that were made upon it

Yappari nanika henda yo Something just does not seem right

The image of you in my mind has vanished
Tashika ni oboeteru tte ieruno kai?
Can I say that I remember you clearly?
Tomare!
Stop!

The past belongs to me
Touzen daretomo torikaetakunai
Of course I do not want to trade it with anyone else

That is because
Basudei datta watashitachi niwa
It was my birthday, and when we saw each other
Deai ga umareta toki ni We could see the first dream

That we had when we were born
Doushiyouka tte nayanda koto mo Worrying about what do I do?
